channel.title: Interview on Aiman Ismail
channel.description: Recent content in Interview on Aiman Ismail

item.title: Interview Series: Explain How Kubernetes DNS works
item.description: This will be the first in my interview questions series. I’ll compile interesting questions that I got from my experience interviewing for DevOps/SRE role in Malaysia. Calling a service by its cluster-internal DNS We’ll go from the highest to the lowest level in this journey. So let’s go through the scenario a bit: you have two services, foo and bar. those two services live in the same namespace app in your cluster.
